Pre-Game Insights: England's red-ball team return to action against Pakistan this week with a major point to prove ahead of a huge summer.
Captain Jos Buttler led his team to glory at the first time of asking in the T20 World Cup 2022 with a confident victory over this series's visitors.

However, things haven't gone to plan since then. England were battered, bruised and, ultimately, humiliated in India during the Cricket World Cup 2023. They lost six out of nine games during their miserable, failed title defence.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The England v Pakistan 1st T20 match takes place at 6:30pm on Wednesday 22nd May 2024.
The series will be broadcast live on Sky Sports Cricket and Main Event.
BBC Test Match Special has the rights to broadcast ball-by-ball commentary of England v Pakistan, with the team set to bring full coverage throughout every match.
Others: You can add the Sky Sports Main Event and Sky Sports Cricket channels for just £18 per month combined or pick up the complete sports package for just £25 per month.
NOW can be streamed through a computer or apps found on most smart TVs, phones and consoles. NOW is also available via BT Sport.
Broadcasts will be aired on BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra and via their online player with build-up of each match starting prior to the time listed above.
